verses.text: In Judah is \w the|strong="H0623"\w* knowledge of God; his name is great in Israel,
\w In|strong="H0430"\w* Salem \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* tent, \w his|strong="H3045"\w* resting-place \w in|strong="H0430"\w* Zion.

\w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* arrows \w of|strong="H4585"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* bow broken, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* he put \w an|strong="H1961"\w* end \w to|strong="H1961"\w* body-cover, sword, \w and|strong="H6726"\w* fight. (Selah.)
\w You|strong="H7665"\w* \w are|strong="H8033"\w* shining \w and|strong="H8033"\w* full \w of|strong="H2719"\w* glory, more than \w the|strong="H7665"\w* eternal mountains.

Gone is \w the|strong="H0215"\w* wealth of \w the|strong="H0215"\w* strong, \w their|strong="H2964"\w* last sleep has overcome \w them|strong="H0215"\w*; \w the|strong="H0215"\w* men of war \w have|strong="H0859"\w* become feeble.

\w At|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* wrath, O \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Jacob, deep \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w has|strong="H0376"\w* overcome carriage \w and|strong="H3027"\w* horse.

You, you \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* feared; \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* keep \w his|strong="H3290"\w* place \w before|strong="H0430"\w* you \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0430"\w* time \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H0430"\w* wrath?

\w From|strong="H6440"\w* heaven \w you|strong="H0859"\w* gave \w your|strong="H6440"\w* decision; \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w its|strong="H5975"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, gave \w no|strong="H4310"\w* sound,

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* took \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w place|strong="H0776"\w* \w as|strong="H0776"\w* judge, \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* poor \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*. (Selah.)
\w The|strong="H3605"\w* ... \w will|strong="H0430"\w* give \w you|strong="H3605"\w* praise; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H0776"\w* ...

\w Give|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0120"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* right; let all \w who|strong="H0120"\w* \w are|strong="H0120"\w* round \w him|strong="H2296"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0120"\w* \w him|strong="H2296"\w* \w who|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H0120"\w* \w to|strong="H0120"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* feared.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* puts \w an|strong="H3068"\w* end \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w rulers|strong="H0430"\w*; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w feared|strong="H4172"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kings \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.
